boat.name: Truant
boat.full_description:
Truant is a rebuild project on its own twin axle bespoke 1500 kg trailer. Motor bike accident stopped project .
Truant has been dry stored since 1992.
Boat is near fully stripped in near full kit form with iroko, cabin roof, hatch supplied by Salterns in late 1990,s, Full set of spars, sails (top sail not used), Lead ballast, Stainless steel standing rigging new, Wykeham-Martin fore stay self furling,Â 
Choice of engines outboard or inboard, currently fitted with controllable pitch propellor and shaft by Water Mota.
Mast, keel stepped, All steel work galvanised, requires new running rigging.
Cockpit cover.
Comprehensive build plans and drawings, history.
boat.short_description: Truant is a Memory 19 awaiting restoration

for_sales.sales_text:
Truant was commissioned in 1988. Her current owner bought her in 1994 and has been dried stored since.

Sale is now forced following injury.

Boats Current State

She is fully stripped out ready for rebuilding and includes: have supplied:

  • a full set of iroko parts pre cut to pattern by Salterns including open slat bench seats and cabin roof.
  • as new hatch in resin glass by Salterns
  • a full set of Douglas fir spars including a keel-stepped mast
  • gaff main, jib and top sail all red(top sail unused) in bag
  • cockpit cover
  • new stainless steel shrouds and forestay
  • Wykeham-Martin furler
  • bobstay chain
  • gaff hoist still original galvanized wire and bronze runner lift
  • many rigging fixings and fittings in galvanized steel
  • many other parts including blocks, etc.
  • Water Mota controllable pitch prop shaft and propeller
  • Hull primed and 2 coats of anti foul applied.
  • galvanized drop keel in good condition.
  • brass port holes
  • lead ballast approx. 500Kg available but buyer may not want all depending on engine selection
  • full set of original drawings and fit out manuals
  • rebuilding bed frame with caster available to fit

The original Water Mota air cooled petrol engine has not been tested but two engines are available from the seller:

  • 4 hp Suzuki long shaft two stroke out board with lifting bracket
  • 12 hp Dolphin twin two stroke petrol - two available one running and tested other not.
  • purpose-built 1500 mgw RM trailer twin axle very little used dry stored suitable to tow boat fully ballasted.

She requires all new running rigging. The main timber item that requires supplying is the cabin aft bulkhead and companion way hatch door. New timber floor boards are suggested rather than painted plywood as originally fitted.

She could be fitted out as:

  • a large open cockpit day boat with out board
  • standard cabin layout
  • forward cabin with through the cabin roof mast mounting providing a large cockpit but still retaining sufficient two berth bunk space.
